attributes.action: Make all energy public energy controlled by the government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the government owned all our power stations and controlled the price of energy, it would be in their interests to keep the price down, it would help control inflation and it shoudl help control climate change because they had the power to change to all enviromentally friendly forms of power, should they be serios on it.
